name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's major "positive energy" bloggers talk about the situation in Syria and its follow-up:
 The heart of a single husband: It is impossible for Damascus to fall. It is impossible to say it is impossible.
 Shen Yi, a professor at Fudan University: The rebels just checked in and took pictures in Aleppo and did not dare to go south.
 Jin Canrong: As long as the Syrian government forces don’t panic, there should be no problem.
 Gu Yan Mu Chan: Syria will not collapse.
 The seventh brother of station B said in the live broadcast: If Syria can be lost, quit the live broadcast industry!
 Blogger "Brother Xiao Talks Overseas": As long as Damascus does not lose, Assad will surely win!
 Follow-up:
 Jin Canrong deleted the video; Shen Yi deleted the video; the live broadcast clip of Brother Qi from Station B talking about the situation in Syria was set to be visible only to him; "Brother Xiao talked about overseas" slapped himself wildly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As Bashar al-Assad fled to Russia, Syrian citizens, filled with resentment, paraded him through the streets using a donkey instead.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Daily Mail reported: Bashar al-Assad and his family came to Moscow with a fortune of $2 billion, where they spent $40 million to buy 19 apartments in Moscow City, including a luxury apartment in the eighth tallest building in Russia. They bought these properties between 2013 and 2019.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many people were cheated while working as part-time food deliverymen in Xiamen, and 700 people were sued by the car dealership for breach of contract and compensation of more than 10,000 yuan.
The company involved used false propaganda such as providing free vehicles and daily wages to trick college students into signing a contract to rent a car. The monthly rent of an electric car is as high as 799, divided into 12 installments, and the contract stipulates that the minimum rent is three months, and there is a sky-high overdue fee of 35 yuan a day. Many of the victims are poor college students. Some students were injured while delivering food and could not afford to go to the hospital because insurance only reimbursed 30%.
The victims tried to call the police to report that the Zhangzhou Huiyin Leasing Co., Ltd. involved in the incident was suspected of fraud, but the police did not care. Some employees in the company could not stand it and leaked the company's list of defaulters. In the first batch alone, more than 700 victims were sued by the company. If they did not want to be sued, they would need to pay the company 13,800 yuan for the settlement privately. The total amount of more than 700 victims was at least tens of millions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that similar routines were exposed by a local TV program in August this year. These companies recruited riders on platforms such as 58, and falsely promised that the company would provide free vehicles to lure students into signing contracts. In addition, the company employees used your mobile phone to sign the contract. Although it has been exposed by TV stations several times, this scam still persists.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hangzhou also has similar routine problems. On December 7, 1818 Golden Eye exposed a woman in Hangzhou who applied for a daily delivery job on an online platform. The recruitment website showed that the salary was as high as 500 yuan, but it was actually a recruitment job for a food delivery company. After working for four days, she was asked to pay 800 yuan when she returned the car. Only then did she find out that she had signed a car rental contract with a monthly rent of 800 yuan, and the rental period was one month. When she rented the car, the car rental company told her that she only needed a deposit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 11, CCTV News released a blockbuster video: General Secretary leads the Chinese economic ship to break through the waves.
The article said that under the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping's economic thought, the whole party and people of all ethnic groups across the country are united and confident, facing difficulties and overcoming them. The Chinese economic ship will surely move forward on the new journey.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger questioned the initial press release of the "female master's degree holder being taken in": Why did the police spend thirteen years without finding Ms. Bu's family, while a volunteer found them in less than two hours?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On December 5, at Guiyu Huamei in Shantou, Guangdong, a car hit a motorcycle and two pedestrians and then fled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Hui woman later complained about her experience on a live streaming platform. All her relatives basically called her and advised her to stop. She also asked in the video: Is it illegal to eat pork?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 10 Handan residents also received a similar reminder that if medical insurance is not renewed on time, there will be policy restrictions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In December, Suzhou suddenly issued a document to open a fuse mechanism for primary and secondary school students' homework. Primary school students can stop doing homework by 21:20, junior high school students by 22:00, and high school students by 23:00.
It was rumored online that this policy was urgently implemented because three students in a school committed suicide by jumping off a building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: Schools in Hebei have begun mobilizing teachers to supervise medical insurance enrollment, requiring screenshots of children’s medical insurance payments to be sent to the school group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russian Satellite News Agency reported on December 10: Belarusian President Lukashenko said that the country has more than ten nuclear warheads.
Belta quoted Lukashenko as saying: "I brought nuclear warheads here, more than ten."
He said that he warned all enemies and opponents that they would be immediately counterattacked as soon as they set foot on the national border.
He stressed: "We reached an agreement with Russia before it returned its nuclear weapons to us."
He also pointed out that the use of nuclear weapons carries great responsibility. He said: "At least after Hiroshima and Nagasaki, no one has pressed the nuclear button."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The owner emptied his savings to buy a house, but the delivery was delayed for two years. The owner had no money to rent a house and had to set up a tent to forcibly move in. The developer called the police to drive them away. The police said: You have no money because of your own choice. The house has not been completed yet and does not meet the living conditions. It is not suitable for living. Woman: I have no money because it is unfinished. This is my house. It is the most suitable place for me to live now. I can live here without spending any money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Lianhe Zaobao, Kim Yong-hyun, the former South Korean Defense Minister who issued the martial law order for South Korea, attempted suicide in the detention center last night (10th)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, migrant workers jumped off a building to demand their wages at the construction site of Youjing Curtain Wall Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in Huicheng District, Huizhou City, Guangdong Province. More than a dozen workers stood on a high place and shouted in unison: Give me back my hard-earned money. The construction party involved said that the contractor Youjing Company had not paid the money, so they had no money to pay wages. The contractor Youjing Company believed that the construction party did not cooperate with the acceptance, and only the acceptance could confirm that the quality of the project met the requirements, and then pay the money according to the contract.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of December 11, an explosion occurred in the Shenzhen luxury residential community Wanyuefu and caused a fire. A woman was forced to the window by the fire and then rolled down the high-rise building

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 10 report, Beijing. The design of the reusable rocket "Jump One" of Dahang Leap Technology Company passed the preliminary review. It caused ridicule from netizens, who accused them of plagiarizing Musk.
Netizens replied, "If Musk didn't succeed, would this plan be approved?" "Does China's aerospace industry have its own original things?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9, Jiangsu. A woman posted that her daughter forgot to wear a red scarf at school, so she was punished by the teacher to buy 80 red scarves for the school. The daughter said, "If I don't buy them, the teacher will beat me." The woman said that although she was very angry, she was also afraid that if she didn't buy them, her daughter would be bullied by the teacher at school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in the UK, a Chinese student used a loophole in the railcard to buy a train ticket. She was discovered by the conductor while riding the train. The conductor asked her to pay for the ticket and told her that she must have the correct railcard. However, the student thought that the conductor was racially discriminating against her. "Why did he ask me to pay for the ticket? The reason is that I am Asian and easy to bully."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
With the arrival of the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Day on December 13, the Japanese Embassy in China has asked the Chinese police to ensure the safety of Japanese people.
On December 6, the Japanese Embassy in China and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued an alert, reminding Japanese people in China not to speak Japanese outside, not to wear clothes that can easily be mistaken for Japanese, try to avoid crowded squares or places with many Japanese people, and pay special attention to the surrounding situation if traveling with children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of December 11, an explosion occurred in the Shenzhen luxury residential community Wanyuefu and caused a fire. A woman was forced to the window by the fire and then rolled down the high-rise building. It is reported that the housing price of this building was once as high as 266,000 yuan per square meter, but recently fell to more than 180,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 10, Hebei. A woman exposed a restaurant franchise scam: the brand would rent a stall and then hire a large number of actors to line up on site to create the illusion of booming business. The victims are usually mothers, middle-aged couples, and newly graduated college students. "Be careful before investing in a franchise"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The explosion was so powerful that it affected Shenzhen's landmark Chunsun Building.
Some netizens said that the fire had not been extinguished as of 5 p.m.: the fire ladder truck ran out of water halfway through spraying.
A group chat of owners of the community where the incident occurred showed that an owner reported a gas leak in the property last night, but the property sent workers but did not investigate and repair it. It is reported that the property fee of the community is as high as 11 yuan per square meter.
The Beijing News said that the cause of the fire was initially judged to be a gas explosion, and the woman who fell from the building had been taken away by 120.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The on-site video shows that there is a suspected pet dog falling from the building

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, after the Central Economic Work Conference was held, the Governor of Hainan Province said: "Concentrate all efforts, eliminate all interference, and exhaust all methods." "Go deep into the front line, work on the spot, provide guidance, open roads when encountering mountains, build bridges when encountering water, use extraordinary means to strive for extraordinary results, and unswervingly complete the established goals and tasks of economic development." 
Netizens replied: "Another Great Leap Forward?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 10, Wushan, Chongqing. Ms. Ma, the person involved in the "Wushan child bride incident", said that when she was 12 years old, her uncle sold her to a man named Chen as a wife, and then she was imprisoned, sexually assaulted and beaten.
And so many years have passed, and the man who imprisoned her is still at large. Ms. Ma also said that the man told others "What are you afraid of? I didn't kill anyone."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States has imposed sanctions on a Chinese company, accusing it of working for intelligence agencies. It also accused an employee of the company named Guan Tianfeng of hacking into thousands of corporate systems around the world, including critical infrastructure companies in the United States.
Federal prosecutors released an indictment accusing Guan of hacking into more than 8,000 firewalls in 2020, stealing company data and installing ransomware. 
The U.S. State Department: A reward of $10 million is offered to find him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Some of the materials for the Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications English Competition were selected from "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China"
The purpose of the competition mentioned: to organically integrate the study of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era with the cultivation of high-level translation ability...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, a barber shop manager slapped himself in the face in order to motivate his employees at a meeting. After the manager slapped himself in the face, the employees next to him also started slapping themselves in the face.
Netizens responded, "Is it worth it to earn a little salary?" "Just have a caesarean section"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 10, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Many elderly people used the "dog hole" method to pass through the gate at the subway station.
Someone nearby reminded them: "You have to buy a ticket, you can't do that."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video saying that when the leader came to the hospital, the special elevator for surgery became the leader's "convenient elevator", causing many patients and their families to wait for a long time but could not take the elevator.
The woman said, "It is said that people are supreme, I think it is the leader who is supreme."
Netizens replied, "This is normal, we have to adapt to this society" "Is it strange?" "This is how it is in China"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the media reported: "Many departments issued a document! Actively absorb college graduates into the domestic service industry" "The first batch of graduates of nursing majors have become popular" triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens replied "Can college graduates be encouraged to enter water, electricity, tobacco, oil and other departments?"
"Will the children of senior officials engage in domestic service?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 2, local media reported the "missing female master's student Huahua" incident as positive news.
The report said that the police overcame difficulties and registered the two children, and the police visited the woman's home many times to understand her situation. For more than ten years, the police have never given up on helping her find her family.
A blogger said: The police did not help her find her family for 13 years. The volunteers came to her home for two hours and asked her to write down the name of her tutor, and she found it after searching on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was revealed online that the Shenzhen campus of the Chinese University of Hong Kong announced that it would use a camera facial recognition system in the next semester to improve attendance, which triggered discussions and complaints from students on the school forum.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11 (Released) Recently, the First Financial News reported, "The latest! 31 provinces' birth rates announced" The report was released at 23:31.
In response, netizens said: "It's ironic, people ask about the low birth rate every day, and the editor is still posting articles at 23:30, and is still selecting my comments, how can I have children?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 10, a blogger wrote about the Guangzhou subway security check incident: You can't install 100 anti-theft doors for safety. Although thieves can't get in, you will collapse because you have to open 100 doors every day when you go home.
The strict security check is ostensibly to prevent people from bringing dangerous objects into the station, but if there are really criminals, it will be more convenient. The subway station is full of people waiting for security checks, and criminals will fight directly in the queue, resulting in a large number of casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the online rumor that the Chinese car company "Jiyue" laid off 40% of its employees has caused heated discussions.
On December 11, Jiyue Automobile refuted the rumors of layoffs, saying that the above rumors were false.
An internal letter to all employees issued by the CEO of Jiyue Automobile was circulated online. Although the letter did not mention dissolution, it mentioned "merging departments and positions with duplicate functions and changing inefficient internal work processes"
On social platforms, some netizens reported being laid off by Jiyue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Internet celebrity Ba Jiong and Minnan Wolf co-produced a CCP united front "documentary", which has been hotly discussed by all walks of life.
China's Taiwan Affairs Office responded to this for the first time on the 11th, criticizing this as "another clumsy trick of the DPP authorities to manipulate cognitive warfare and create green terror."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Jinan, Shandong. Volunteers gave away down jackets to outdoor workers on the street.
As a result, they were snatched by workers at a labor market. Some workers did not queue up and directly grabbed the down jackets. The scene was once in chaos. The volunteers had to evacuate back to the car, while the workers cursed outside the car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
General Administration of Customs of China: On December 10, Yu Jianhua, Secretary of the Party Committee and Director of the General Administration of Customs of the Communist Party of China, died of a sudden illness at the age of 63. 
It was previously rumored that Yu Jianhua committed suicide in his office late last night after being interviewed by disciplinary inspection personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 11, Reuters reported that as Trump's return to the White House approaches, China's top policymakers are considering allowing the yuan to depreciate in 2025 in response to Trump's future tariff policies.
People familiar with the matter said the move under consideration reflects China's recognition of the need for greater economic stimulus to counter Trump's threat of punitive trade measures.
After the news was released, the RMB exchange rate plunged in the short term.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 10, Guizhou. In the cold winter, an old lady wearing shabby clothes leaned on the roadside and was drowsy, while the brooms sold at the stall were not in demand. The video resonated with tens of thousands of netizens.
Netizens responded, "Some people are born to enjoy happiness, while some are born to suffer," "The meaning of life is to live"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Xichang, Sichuan. Three pedestrians were crossing a zebra crossing when an off-road vehicle rushed over without slowing down, and the three were instantly knocked away.
Eyewitness: They died before they could be rescued. The three people who were hit did not look very old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a student at Tongji Nursing College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology submitted an application to the college to change her basic personal identity information from male to female due to gender reassignment surgery.
The college hereby made a public announcement, which detailed the student's name, major, ID number and other information.
Some lawyers believe that private information should be handled anonymously.
The school responded: The announcement is true, "there are relevant departments and procedures"
